summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4). The backend provides WiFi analysis and optimization recommendations with data persistence. The frontend includes a complete form-based interface for WiFi configuration input, displays optimization recommendations with before/after comparisons, implements a simulated speed testing feature with historical tracking via trend charts, and features a cohesive modern design theme using energetic green (hue 142) and orange (hue 85) colors as specified.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify user authentication requirements. Files useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, and main.tsx implement Internet Identity authentication and identity-based data segregation, which was not requested.
